channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Self-made millionaire Barbara Corcoran warns not to make the mistake of asking for a raise: Do these 2 things instead
item.description: Shark Tank’s Barbara Corcoran believes you can score a pay raise if you’re prepared to negotiate properly—but whatever you do, ‘don’t go in there and ...

item.title: Trump’s tariffs are sending ultra-rich investors to Europe and Asia: ‘The world has changed in the last 3 months’
item.description: Driven by policy uncertainty and potential economic or market disruptions in the U.S., rich investors are looking abroad.

item.title: From Stuttgart to Detroit: How Europe’s car giants are bracing for Trump’s tariff tsunami
item.description: European automakers face price hikes, production shifts and supply chain chaos as Trump’s 25% tariff upends the transatlantic car market.

item.title: Trump is a drunk driver taking the economy off the cliff into a needless recession—as we warned
item.description: With Trump enacting tariffs in the most uncertainty-inducing way possible, businesses are paralyzed—with devastating repercussions.

item.title: The new leadership imperative: Championing uniquely human skills in the AI era
item.description: Unlocking the potential of human-AI collaboration requires rethinking our approach to work, leadership, and human development.

item.title: Tech-stock-intensive Nasdaq is now testing bear-market territory — live updates
U.S. stock market has lost $9.6 trillion in value since Inauguration Day
Dow industrials fall a further 1,055 points at Friday opening bell — follow live
U.S. unemployment rate edges up as economy generates more new jobs than forecast
Tesla, and Musk, in crosshairs as Trump-vs.-China trade war unfolds
